item.description:
Hey everyone,

I've been doing this trip with some of my friends every year for quite while now and thought I'd open it up to you folks.

Here's the lowdown:

This year's Drink & Drift will be the weekend of August 14th-16th. I've secured a place we can camp at Friday night (my dad's girlfriend's house in Fryeburg). I've reserved some canoes for us as well.

Here's the breakdown:

Pricing:
$45 per canoe per day ($45 per person for the weekend - 2 people per canoe) and $14 transportation fee for the canoes ($7 per person) for a total of $52 per person. I need a $15 deposit from everyone to hold the canoes. I will hold the canoes until the end of the day on August 6th. If I haven't received a deposit from anyone I'll need to release the canoe(s) as that's the cutoff for a refund. Also, parking at Swans Falls is $8 so we can make a plan regarding parking before we head up.

Supplies (What we'll need - please use the poll to list anything you're bringing so we don't have too much of any one item):
Tents (I have one, but we'll need more than that)
Firewood
Coolers (I have one, but we'll need more than that)
Food (burgers/dogs/chicken/snacks/fruit etc)
Beverages (water/alcholic/non alcoholic)
Toys (both beach and water)
Bug spray
Sunscreen
Sleeping bags (if you don't have one let me know)
Grill (I have this)
Toilet Paper
Condiments
Paper plates
Plastic Utensils
Music (I have this)
Garbage bags (I have these)

I'm planning on taking the 14th off and heading up early. If anyone is interested in doing the same, let me know.

I'll keep updating this every few days so please check back periodically so we can stay on track.

Looking forward to seeing you all!!

Cat and Dog
item.name: Canoe Trip - Saco River (Maine)
